TopicTitle: Can someone post up-to-date maps of all the celestial bodies?

Articles.Content: Since my computer becomes a lagfest (That's not a word) whenever i try to access Google images, can someone please help a map-fanatic out and post accurate maps of all the celestial bodies. Thanks.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)(Also, mods, please move this thread if it is in the wrong forum.)
Thanks, but I meant pictures that I can copy-paste and doodle stuff all over.

Well, you could use the ScanSat mod by DMagic to map the bodies yourself. The in-game generated maps are exportable as image files. 

Use the right scanner, mind you.

> 
> Thanks, but I meant pictures that I can copy-paste and doodle stuff all over.

Printscreen, mspaint, paste, crop.
Thanks again- though for some reason, right clicking doesn't work. But, screenshot & paste does!

> 
> Thanks again- though for some reason, right clicking doesn't work. But, screenshot & paste does!

Yeah they're not static images. It's actually using a Google Maps type interface. It may actually be Google Maps' API or something. But printscreen always worked for me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Printscreen, mspaint, paste, crop.

\*facepalm\* Why didn't I think of that...? Not enough coffee, I wager.
